data.title: Microsoft and GitHub workers protest ICE contracts in latest demonstration of employee activism
data.text: Microsoft employees are showing solidarity with workers at GitHub, a subsidiary of the company, who want their employer to cancel contracts with Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

data.title: 5 Big Tech Stocks to Buy Now

data.text: CNBC is unveiling its inaugural Financial Advisor 100 List. The number one ranked financial advisor David Rea, Salem Investment Counselors, joins 'Fast Money Halftime Report' to discuss how they advise their clients and his advice for investment strategy.

data.text: Microsoft is not cheap, but it deserves its premium. MSFT stock is likely to keep growing thanks to cloud computing and AI.
